description:
[Enjoy Novelmates]
Novelmates is your gateway to a romantic world of addictive novels from various genres. Dive into captivating stories, explore new plots on those web novels. With Novelmates, immerse yourself into storytelling anytime, anywhere.

[Features]
1.Extensive Library: Access a diverse library of novels spanning multiple genres, including romance, mystery, fantasy, science fiction, thriller, and more.

2.Personalized Recommendations: Discover new novels tailored to your preferences based on your favorite novels and stories.

3.Bookmarking: Bookmark your favorite novels and never lose your place in a story.

4.Night Mode: Read comfortably in low-light conditions with the night mode feature, reducing eye strain.

5.Seamless Experience: Enjoy a seamless reading experience with smooth page-turning animations and intuitive navigation controls.

6.Subscriptions: Enjoy the unlimited reading experience without interruptions after subscribing, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the story.

[Tranding Novel For You]
- Billionaire
- Werewolf
- Romance
- Badboy
- Mafia


Discover the joy of reading with Novelmates and unlock a world of good novels. Download now and start your literary journey today!

Novelmates Agreement

Novelmates Privacy
http://www.ireader.mobi/index.php?ca=lang.EnPrivacy

SideBooks is a high performance, high speed PDF viewer that allows you to enjoy reading with the feel of actual paper.

=Features=

Curl animation that simulates the actual turning of paper pages has been added to the standard page slide function.
Supports viewing from 3 directions, documents that open left to right, right to left and vertically. It provides the optimal environment for viewing any book.
All zoom rates have been optimized providing high speed, dynamic screen display.
An infinite hierarchy of folders can be created, moved, deleted, renamed, etc. using the enhanced bookshelf management function.
Real visual bookshelf function that corresponds to back cover style display.
Files can be imported by 3 methods, Network transfer through Dropbox, USB transfer through iTunes and direct transfer from other applications.
Books can be protected so others cannot view them by using the password protected locking function.
This is a universal application that operates on the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.


=Functions=

Overall:
*Brightness Adjustment
*Screen rotates to match the orientation of the device
*Screen Rotation Lock
*Password Protected Start-up Lock

Viewer:
*Support PDF,ZIP,CBZ,RAR and CBR format
*Page Turning: Choose from slide or curl
*Viewing Directions: Choose from opening left to right / right to left / vertically
*Page Spacing: Choose form wide / narrow / none
*Facing Pages: Choose the pair of facing pages by setting the cover to on or off
*Trim function within the range of page display
*Cache pre-read function for the previous and next pages
*Set the display for each book and remember the page number of the last page read
*Text search function (list display type)
*Contents function (also supports hierarchy type)
*Bookmark function (with editable memos)
*Edit handwritten notes
*Send to other applications (Open-In)
*Send by email
*Printing function (Air Print)
*In-page link function
*Link to outside URL function (built-in browser / Safari / Printing)
*Display / Don't Display link buttons
*Page turning function using tap or swipe
*Expansion / Contraction function using pinch and double tap (1-1024x zoom)
*Viewing of encrypted PDF files with password protection
*Display / non-display of statusbar when reading

Bookshelf:
*Display form: Choose form list bookshelf / visual bookshelf
*Function to set theme of visual bookshelf with each folder
*Bookshelf thema extension pack (Add-On)
*Cover editing function (corresponds to the trim)
*File editing function: create, move, delete, setting for all books in folder
*Bookmark list
*Reading history list
*Unread list
*Edit of mark choose form already read / unread
*Book name search function
*Network transfer through Dropbox
*USB transfer through iTunes
*Direct transfer from other applications

Special thanks to, 
"Give My Regards to Black Jack"
SHUHO SATO
Manga on Web
http://mangaonweb.com

description:
GoodNovel- A Must Have App For Web Novels！
- Book Genres: Romance, Mystery, Fantasy, Western, Sci-fi, Fan-fic
- Become An Author to REALIZE YOUR WRITING DREAM
Collection of Best Books & Hottest New Reads in Every Genre!

GoodNovel has collected popular web novels and books, provides you with the latest chapters of the highest quality. This is a must-have book app for the majority of web novel lovers.

Start reading your favorite book, by downloading the GoodNovel app！

- No.1 Book Reading Platform for Novel Lovers
- Numerous of Book Genres for Choosing Freely
- Hundreds of web novel Read More Than 1,000,000+ Times
- Professional Author Team Creates Best Novel

Book Genres
GoodNovel contains many web novel genres,  from urban books to supernatural books, and is deeply loved by the majority of our readers.

So many book genres await you to explore on GoodNovel App.

Anyone can find their favorite web novel on GoodNovel. Start reading web novel without delay!

Hottest Web Novels
If you’re looking for any of these web novels below, then you’ll love GoodNovel for sure.
-「Most Read 5 Web Fictions 2024」
-「Most Romantic Top 5 Love Story Web Fictions」
-「Top 5 Novels of All Web Fiction Platforms」
-「Best Sellers of Web Fictions 2024 - Love & Romance」
-「Top 10 Must Read Romantic Web Fictions for Romantic Book Lovers」

Trending web novel at GoodNovel:
 - 「When His Eyes Opened」By Simple Silence
 - 「Alpha Asher」By Jane Doe
 - 「The Divorced Billionaire Heiress」By I Wanna Eat Meat 
 - 「The Dark Side Of Fate」By Karima Sa'ad Usman
 - 「His Dark Obsession」By Moonlight Muse

GoodNovel has hundreds of books that have been read more than 1 million times, and you can read these novels as much as you want without having to buy the paperback edition!

Topping Author Team
Our GoodNovel authors are from all over the world, with experience and talent in writing stories of many different genres and update frequently for their fans to read over and over again.

GoodNovel has been continuously recruiting high-quality authors and has a steady stream of new content recommendations.

**Join GoodNovel & Become A Professional Author!**

About Payment
GoodNovel is unfortunately not a totally free online novel platform. Because we at GoodNovel need to ensure that our authors can obtain a stable income to produce better quality content for you to read.

At the same time, GoodNovel has a lot of in-app tasks that you can easily complete to obtain coins to continue reading new chapters.

If you have any dissatisfaction with the charges or feedback, please write an email to contact@goodnovel.com

How To Contact Us

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodNovel Bundle to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

Service

WebComics™ is the ultimate destination for Comic & Manhwa fans worldwide, offering the latest and hottest authentic comic series. Whether you're a fan of Manga, Manhwa, or Webtoon, we provide exhilarating and high-definition comic reads of numerous genres, including Romance, Action, Fantasy, Comedy, BL, GL, Drama, Horror, and more. If you fancy billionaires, destined partners, dominant CEOs, vampires, love triangles, otherworldly adventures, time-travel, enemies-to-lovers, or contractual marriage, it's your go-to platform for reading the best stories. Come and enjoy reading webtoons on www.webcomicsapp.com.
 
Why Choose WebComics™
1. A World of Infinite Comic & Manga Excitement
WebComics™ presents top-notch and exclusive comics, manga & manhwa from acclaimed creators across the globe. Our all-covered genres cater to your every interest and preference!
2. Unparalleled Experience in Reading Exclusive Comics & Manhwa
WebComics™ offers a plethora of exclusive original manhwa, manga & webtoons featuring distinctive and innovative storytelling, unparalleled creativity, and a reading experience that stands out as top-tier.
3. Daily Free Reading Privileges
Indulge in daily free reading perks on WebComics™, catering to fans of Romance, Action, Fantasy, or LGBTQ genres. Come back each day for our newest free manhwa, webtoon & manga giveaway events!
4. Tailored Recommendations Just for You
We push personalized and captivating manhwa & manga suggestions that perfectly align with your interests.
5. Free Downloads and Offline Reading Convenience
No Internet? Download your preferred stories at no cost and enjoy them offline, ideal for travel or time killing.
 
Trending Manhwa & Manga, Webtoon at WebComics™
＃Action / Sci-fi comics＃——The Unstoppable
＃Fantasy manhwa＃——The Jobless Guy Who Has Come to Slay
＃Action manga＃——The Invincible Warlord
＃Romance manhwa＃——The True Heiress Is an All-Powerful Bigshot
＃Drama webtoon＃——Spoiled Rotten by My Uncles
＃Modern Romance manhwa＃——Live Happily Ever After With My Exes
WebComics™ features over 5 million reads of webtoon, manga and manhwa on numerous genres, allowing you to access these manga & manhua without the need to purchase physical copies!
 
Top-ranking Author Team
Join our diverse community of WebComics authors from around the globe! Our talented webtoon & comic creators produce captivating content daily. Don't miss out on the opportunity to be a part of our brilliant team!
Send us your work right now! Email: comiceditor@webcomicsapp.com
 
Follow Us

An ebook and audiobook app designed exclusively for purchases made at https://cup.columbia.edu.



Welcome to the Columbia University Press app, powered by Glassboxx. We are delighted to offer you an easy and secure way to enjoy your ebook purchases.

No password required — simply log in with the email address you used to buy the book on the Columbia University Press website and enter the verification code sent to your email. Your purchased content can be found in the “My Books” area of the app. An internet connection is required to download the content. Once content has been downloaded, you can access and enjoy it offline.



 EBOOK READER

 • Bookmarking opens the book across multiple devices
 • Font-size and font face changes, as well as dyslexic-friendly font
 • Background colour changes
 • Full text search


AUDIOBOOK PLAYER
• Auto-saves your current position in the book so you can pick up right where you left off, even if listening on multiple devices
• Skips forward and backward
• Sleep timer
• Plays on lock-screen, enabling easy access to playback controls
• Plays in the background while you browse other apps
• Plays immediately and downloads in the background (if internet access is available)

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

Welcome to Webfic - Fantastic Reading, your passport to a world of enchanting tales and captivating narratives! Dive into a universe of words, where extraordinary stories await your exploration. This immersive online reading app is designed to transport you to far-off realms and tantalize your imagination with a vast collection of web novels.  

Webfic is a reading app with massive original English stories, including urban, romance, fantasy, werewolf, classic, and so on. With Webfic - Fantastic Reading, your online reading experience will never be the same again. Imagine being able to embark on thrilling adventures, unravel mysteries, and fall in love with characters, all from the convenience of your mobile device. 

Highlights

- Immersive Stories & Personalized Recommendations
Delve into a treasure trove of web novels that spans multiple genres, from heartwarming romances to suspenseful mysteries and epic fantasies. Our carefully curated library has something for every reader, ensuring you'll never run out of captivating tales to explore. And Webfic's intuitive recommendation system can help you discover more free stories that align with your interests. Whether you're a fan of billionaires, dramas, or romance, Webfic has a story waiting just for you.

- Customizable Reading Experience
One of the key features of Webfic is the ability to customize the reading experience. Users can adjust the background color, font size, and brightness to suit their preferences, ensuring optimal comfort for their eyes. Whether you prefer reading in the daytime or under the covers with a flashlight, Webfic accommodates your unique reading style. This level of personalization enhances the overall reading experience and sets Webfic apart from other free reading apps.

- Offline Reading & Regular Updates.
No internet? No problem! Download your favorite stories and read them offline, perfect for those times when you're on the go or just want to escape into a world of words without any distractions. Stories on Webfic are updated frequently, so you'll never have to wait long for the next chapter or episode. Say goodbye to cliffhangers that keep you waiting in suspense!


Key Features
- Get real-time recommendations of original free stories according to your preferences.
- Have a wonderful reading experience through the function of adjusting the background color.
- Save your favorite stories in the library to keep the latest chapter with you wherever you go.

Webfic is not just a reading app, it's a gateway to new worlds, a source of inspiration, and a community of book lovers coming together to celebrate the joy of reading. Escape reality for a while and explore the vast realms of fiction that are just a tap away. 

So, what are you waiting for? Start your journey with Webfic - Fantastic Reading today and unlock the door to a world of limitless storytelling possibilities. Whether you're a seasoned bookworm or just looking for an escape from the ordinary, Webfic welcomes you with open arms. Webfic - Fantastic Reading is a free reading app to use. If you want, you can also subscribe to unlock all the good novels for free. 


Note: If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account when you confirm the purchase. Unless the user turns off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends. Otherwise, the system automatically extends the validity period. Within 24 hours of the end of the current subscription period, the system will charge the account renewal fee according to the price of the selected plan. After completing the purchase, users can manage their subscriptions and automatic renewal in account Settings.

WaStory provides a continuous flow of new chapters, a refuge from the ordinary, ensuring you always have a fresh story to ignite your imagination. Here's what you can expect from WaStory:

WaStory is designed to transform your reading experience into a magical journey, where every page turn unveils a new world of wonder.

Don't delay—download WaStory now and embark on an adventure through a dazzling array of captivating stories. Why wait? Join the vibrant WaStory community and let the stories unfold.

Unlock the timeless wisdom of the Bhagavad Gita with the Bhagavad Gita For All app & coffee table book.

Our coffee table Bhagavad Gita For All app & book brings the timeless teachings of Bhagwan Shri Krishna to life with custom-made video explanations for each of the 700 shlokas of the Bhagavad Gita.

Unique Features:

- Physical + Digital Experience: Each of the 700 shloks is accompanied by a QR code, seamlessly blending the physical and digital worlds.

- Detailed Explanations: Each QR Code packs the Context & Explanation to the shloka. If you are a first time reader or an experienced one, these detailed context and explanations are sure to pave way for a new insight into the endless repository of divine knowledge that the Bhagavad Gita is.

- Tailored Lessons: Whether you seek personal growth, social harmony, or professional excellence, our app offers customized lessons for every aspect of life.

- Surreal animated Krishna: Witness the divine teachings of Krishna come to life through stunning animations, making the wisdom of the Bhagavad Gita more relatable and easier to understand than ever before.

Our mission is to make the profound teachings of the Bhagavad Gita accessible and relevant to modern individuals. By integrating cutting-edge technology with ancient wisdom, we aim to provide a unique learning experience that enriches every aspect of your life.

The Phygital Advantage:

Our Bhagavad Gita is not just a book; it's an interactive experience. The QR codes allow you to dive deep into each shlok, offering a multi-dimensional understanding that is both engaging and educational.

Tired of paying $10-15 for every book? BookFlix gives you access to over 15,000 educational books spanning history, science, self-improvement, and more for less than the price of a single paperback each month.

WHY BOOKFLIX?

15,000+ Educational Books - From history and science to business and self-improvement. Our AI-curated collection covers dozens of topics to expand your knowledge.

200 Downloads Per Day - More than you can read. Download books for offline reading with generous daily limits that refresh daily.

Library Sync (Premium) - Download books on one device, access those same books on another. Your downloaded books sync across devices when enabled.

True Offline Reading - Downloaded books stay on your device. Perfect for flights, commutes, or anywhere without internet.

Customizable Reading Experience - 11 beautiful fonts including OpenDyslexic for accessibility. Adjust size, spacing, and theme (dark/light mode) to match your preference.

Curated Library - 15,000+ educational books covering every subject from history and science to business and personal development.

PERFECT FOR:

Curious minds who love learning new things
Parents building a quality family library
Commuters with long reading time
Anyone wanting unlimited books without the unlimited cost

HOW IT WORKS:

Start with 7 days of free access (100 downloads/day)
Browse 15,000+ titles organized by genre and curated collections
Download any book with one tap
Read offline with a distraction-free interface
Access your library across iPhone and iPad (sync optional)

TRANSPARENT PRICING:

Monthly: $5.99/month - less than one coffee per month
Annual: $59.99/year - save 17% (just $5.00/month)
Up to 7 days of free access for new users
Cancel anytime, no questions asked

ACCESSIBILITY FEATURES:

OpenDyslexic, Lexend, and Atkinson Hyperlegible fonts for readers with dyslexia
Adjustable text size and line spacing
High-contrast reading modes
Dark/light theme for visual comfort

NO ADS. NO TRACKING. NO UPSELLS.
Just you and your books. That's it.

WHAT YOU WON'T FIND HERE:
We're not trying to be everything to everyone. No audiobooks, no magazines, no comics - just a focused collection of quality ebooks you'll actually want to read. AI-curated with quality oversight to ensure every book is worth your time.

SUBSCRIPTION TERMS:
Subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage or cancel anytime through your App Store account settings. Your free access period gives you 100 downloads per day. Premium subscriptions get 200 downloads per day.

app_name: The Holy Quran: Audio and Text
description:
The Holy Quran: Audio and Text is a comprehensive application that enables users to read, learn, and reflect on the Holy Quran with ease and effectiveness.
features :

A new and easy-to-use interface: The application is designed with a modern and intuitive user interface that makes it easy for users to navigate and access various features.
Accreditation of the King Fahd Complex Edition: The application uses the King Fahd Complex Edition for the Printing of the Holy Quran, known for its reliability and mastery, which ensures the accuracy and correctness of the text.
Interactive and integrated reading: The application provides the ability to read interactively with the text of the electronic Quran, in addition to listening to recitations, and studying and memorizing the Holy Quran with ease.
Flexible reading: Users can read the Quran as if they were reading the Quran book or choose to put the single verse for greater focus.
Text search feature: The application contains an instant search feature in the verses of the Quran, with the ability to go directly to the desired page or surah.

Add bookmarks: This feature allows you to save pages or verses for easy reference at any time.

Listen to verses: The application provides the ability to listen to each verse in the voice of famous reciters.

Easy navigation between surahs: The application allows you to navigate between surahs in a smooth and fast way.

Reading punctuation marks: This feature helps you understand the appropriate places to stop while reading.

Changing color styles: The application supports changing color styles, including dark mode, to improve the reading experience.

Listen and download: Surahs can be listened to or downloaded to listen to later without the need for the Internet.

These features make the "The Holy Quran: Audio and Text" application a comprehensive tool for anyone who wants to read, learn, and contemplate the Holy Quran in an easy and effective way.

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

Read Free Comics
- At MangaToon, many of our comics require paying a unlocking fee to read. The reason is that manga creators also need to make a living. Only with manga fans' support, they can continue to create better comic storiess. Your support is the best motivation for them to create mangas.

Great Manga Reading Experience

Tell stories like chatting

From the makers of Quran.com comes Quran for iOS, a beautiful, and ad-free mushaf app. 

It’s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it and listen to your favorite reciters.

This is just the beginning for Quran for iOS. We’ll be updating the app regularly insha'Allah and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at ios@quran.com

As the Hadeeth (prophetic statement) in At-Tirmithi states: “Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten. I am not saying that 'Alif, Laam, Meem' (a combination of letters frequently mentioned in the Holy Quran) is a letter, rather I am saying that ‘Alif’ is a letter, ‘Laam’ is a letter and ‘Meem’ is a letter.” [At-Tirmithi] We hope this app will help you increase your recitation of the Quran and increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. 


من صناع Quran.com يأتي تطبيق القرآن للأجهزة المحمولة، تطبيق للمصحف ذو صفحات جميلة خالي تماما من الاعلانات.

لقد أصبح من السهل قراءة القرآن بالشارع، وحفظه، والاستماع إلى قارئك المفضل.

هذا هو مجرد بداية لتطبيق القرآن. سنعمل على تحديث التطبيق بشكل منتظم إن شاء الله، ونحب أن نسمع رأيك ومتطلبتك. يمكنك الوصول إلينا عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني ios@quran.com

عَنْ ابْنِ مَسْعُودٍ قَالَ : قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ { مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ حَسَنَةٌ وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا, لَا أَقُولُ الم حَرْفٌ, وَلَكِنْ أَلِفٌ حَرْفٌ, وَلَامٌ حَرْفٌ,وَمِيمٌ حَرْفٌ }. رَوَاهُ التِّرْمِذِيُّ. ونحن نأمل أن يساعدك هذا التطبيق على زيادة قراءتك للقرآن وزيادة حسناتك في الدنيا والآخرة.

This app contains the Word of God in several languages: 1) Tibetan, 2) English, 3) Mandarin, 4) Nepali, 5) Hindi, 6) Sanskrit NT in Tibetan writing
If you press the little “book” icon on the top right you can change the windows on the screen: Now choose either
- “single pane” if you want to see the Tibetan only
- "two panes" to display the Tibetan at the top and the English or Mandarin or Nepali or Hindi or Sanskrit at the bottom
- "verse by verse" to display a verse in Tibetan followed by the same verse in one of the other languages of your choice.

•	Bookmark and highlight your favorite verses

You can choose the background image, move the text around the image, change the font, text size, alignment, format and color. The finished image can be saved to the device and shared with others.
